name: Constellation Distantia
description: Constellation Distantia is an action-adventure game with lightweight strategy and rpg elements. Player will unravel the story of Distantia in a game of missions, mining, crafting and surviving. And of course fast paced flying.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 620 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1600 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum required GPU for VR is a GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GPU GeForce 760 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1600 MB available space
